category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: VIS_mmv_use_lwb
preference.preference_description: Indicates if the Light-weight BOM is to be used to configure occurrences for massive model display. Valid Values: *true: the Light-weight BOM is used which provides higher performance but currently has some feature limitations (no effectivity support). *false: the regular BOM is used, which provides full BOM feature support but has reduced performance. This is the default value.
